entry.title: When Things Go Bump in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightHunterShotDown

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,625Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Bruce Wayne is a strange agent. He stays in his office in the basement, and he believes in the paranormal and supernatural. He is called 'Spooky' by almost everyone in the building.Clark Kent pretends to be a skeptic, everyone believes him, but hides his true alien nature away from them all, opting rather to just be the partner of the 'weird guy in the basement'.Hopefully, Clark can maintain his skeptic persona in front of the man who keeps dragging him into the strangest of situations.

entry.title: How did two broke journalists wind up with the famously unattainable bachelor billionaires?
entry.summary:
Author: tearsofjoyandsorrow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,572Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 11

Summary: What if there were a universe where DC and Marvel were intermixed and we got to see the insane similarities of superbat and starker?In this universe, it just so happens that the Daily Bugle and the Daily Planet are sister companies working out of New York and Metropolis, respectively, and every once and a while, there are larger crossover events in which Peter Parker and Clark Kent interact. They aren't best friends by any means, but they get along quite well.Simultaneously, Bruce Wayne and Tony Stark are maintaining a strange frenemies dynamic. When the world looks like it's going to end, the two of them band together to resolve things, but outside of that, they frequently try to one-up each other with their tech, bank accounts and sexual conquests.I'm still not sure what I am doing, but someone said they would read this, so here I try!

entry.title: Like Sunshine After Rain
entry.summary:
Author: vela (volamena)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,089Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Clark feels Bruce’s fingers shifting around his bicep as if feeling for something. He watches as a myriad of emotions flutter through Bruce’s eyes, from suspicion to surprise to concern to suspicion again. Clark doesn’t know what to make of that. Did Bruce Wayne just…feel him up?“Er, Mr. Wayne?”Bruce retracts his hand like he's been burned. He shifts back into position, as if returning to his baseline state after mentally filing away some information. “I apologize, Mr. Kent. Thank you for your time today. Alfred will escort you out. Please have a safe trip back to Metropolis.”Now it’s Clark’s turn to stare at him. “Uh…right. Have a good night, Mr. Wayne.” Bruce just stares back.Yeah, Clark decides, Bruce Wayne is weird.

entry.title: A Bat-Vacay
entry.summary:
Author: Alex_Blanc

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,177Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 5

Summary: The Wayne family rarely, if ever, went on vacation. If Bruce agreed to leave Gotham for more than twelve hours, it was usually because the Justice League had collectively dragged him somewhere “for his own good.” This time, both the Batfamily and the League had conspired against him. It had been Dick’s idea, loudly seconded by Barry, that they all deserved a break on neutral ground—a sunny coastal resort tucked away on a private island.

entry.title: Baby, Look At Us Now
entry.summary:
Author: queerbonafide

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,730Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 96

Summary: “You’ve made me pregnant.”Clark blinked once again. He almost expected him to start laughing, but he already knew him perfectly well. Bruce wasn’t joking. He was absolutely serious. His face was pale as milk, and his hands trembled anxiously with every movement. He looked so lost and resigned; Bruce Wayne was clearly on the edge of tears, trying so hard to push them back. Clark swallowed and, yes you guessed it, he cursed under his breath.“Fucking hell.” -----What if Clark and Bruce receive more than one miracle? Will their new relationship survive? Will they be able to overcome all difficulties and build a real family?

entry.title: Instructions for Surviving a Gotham Heatwave
entry.summary:
Author: ziptiesand

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,810Chapters: 5/22Kudos: 7

Summary: Clark is not getting the romantic summer vacation Bruce promised, and instead, has been assigned the company of one Zatanna Zatara while Bruce continues to work on another ever-important, ever-urgent case in Gotham. The thing is, this would all be fine and normal, if Zatanna's heart wasn't constantly skipping a beat whenever Clark was around, or if she and Bruce weren't teetering on the edge of spilling their guts out to each other at any given moment.Meanwhile, Red Hood is on the verge of another Lazarus Pit-induced mental breakdown, Nightwing is only just starting to remember that his name is not, in fact, Ric Grayson, and they keep crossing paths while on a case. Cue cat-and-mouse chases across rooftops, trips to Zatanna's parlour of magical cognitive therapy, and an undercover drugs bust at The Iceberg Lounge, where ex crime-lord Red Hood might get more than he bargained for with his interim partner in crime.It's going to be an interesting summer.

entry.title: Heart, mind, body, and a quick fuck.
entry.summary:
Author: crushedupskeletons

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,287Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: They both know there's tension between the two of them. Clark watches as Bruce continues to mess with his cufflinks and avoid long eye contact. Bruce, when he occasionally lifts his head, watches as Clark's fingers tap against his outer thigh. “So you came all the way to Gotham for Harvey Dent's fundraiser?” Bruce asks, finally looking up.“Really? Sure. Yeah. That's why.” He leans closer to Bruce, his mouth right by his ear. “It’s because I want you to fuck me. That's why I’m here. If it wasn’t obvious.”Aka,Clark wasn't Invited to Harvey's political fundraiser for a reason-- Bruce knew he wouldn't be able to contain himself. He'd been avoiding Clark for sometime now after they hooked up.When he shows up regardless, Bruce knows what he has to do to clear the tension.

entry.title: Too Close For Comfort
entry.summary:
Author: NoodleDragon324

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,827Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 343

Summary: There’s a new reporter at the daily planet, Clark Kent. There is also a new superhero across the bay, Superman. Clark tries his best to respect people’s privacy, but with super senses, it’s kinda hard to not figure out that Bruce Wayne is Batman. It’s also kinda hard to not fall a bit in love with the guy.Bruce Wayne finds himself falling for a young reporter who keeps making odd appearances in his life. This man is simultaneously the most lucky and unlucky man, and probably one of the most innocently stupid. Batman is also beginning to form an odd friendship with his new neighbor, Superman. As much as he doesn’t want to like the guy, he can’t get him off his mind.AKAClark knows Batman's identity and sees how long it takes for Bruce to discover his. Cue the romance for The World's Finest power couple!
